name: send_private_message
description: Confirm an explicit target QQ user_id and the intended message goal for a private message. Only use this when the user clearly requests sending to a specific QQ user (or when replying in the current private chat and you must include a <user_id> routing tag). Do NOT invent ids; pick an id that exists in the current <sentra-user-question> context or in <sentra-social-context>. If the target is not explicit, ask a clarifying question instead of calling this tool.

user_id.description: Target QQ user_id (digits only). MUST be an existing id from context (e.g., <sender_id> in <sentra-user-question>) or from <sentra-social-context>. Do NOT guess or fabricate ids.

content.description: Message intent/summary (what you want to convey). Keep it concise. If you are not sure whether the user really wants to send a private message, do NOT call this tool.
examples: 向对方说明我会晚到10分钟并道歉

when.description: 时间表达：如 '5分钟后' / '30秒后' / '明天09:00' / '2025-12-16 21:30' / ISO 字符串。请使用清晰、可解析的时间表达，避免使用『稍后』『改天』『有空的时候』『尽快』『5分钟之后』等模糊说法。

language.description: 语言标识，例如 zh|en（默认 zh）

timezone.description: IANA 时区名称，例如 Asia/Shanghai

targetISO.description: 预解析好的绝对时间（ISO 字符串），例如 '2025-12-16T21:30:00+08:00'；如提供，将被上游优先用作目标时间。

schedule.description: 可选：当用户需要延迟处理或延迟反馈时使用。具体是仅延迟反馈还是到点再执行，由上层调度策略（例如 immediate_exec / delayed_exec）决定；若到点未完成，将先反馈进行中状态。

media_hints.description: Optional hints if the message should include media. Final sending still uses <resources> with routing prefixes.

source_hint.description: A hint of the file/url to use (may be omitted if unknown).
